title: "CT-based radiomics deep learning to predict lymph node metastasis in tumors"
excerpt: "Researchers at University of Tsukuba have developed an imaging model to predict preoperative lymph node metastasis in nonfunctional pancreatic neuroendocrine tumors by combining radiomics (data analysis based on radiological images) and deep learning;"
